name: STATE v. John J. HUGHES III

parties: STATE v. John J. HUGHES III.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of habeas corpus is denied.
MURRAY, J., did not participate.

attorneys: John F. Sheehan, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Joel S. Chase, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. John J. HUGHES III.
No. 83-462-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Sept. 28, 1983.
John F. Sheehan, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Joel S. Chase, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., for respondent.
